taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section arguti;species independens;

treatment.description: Erect, up to 1 m. high, with deltoid prickles 6-10 mm. long; primocane-leaflets 3 or 5; the terminal leaflet cordate-ovate, acuminate, somewhat lobulate; racemes standing well above bracteal leaves, the lower pedicel sometimes forking, the pedicels only 1-2 cm. long; corolla about 2 cm. broad.
